scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:MediaGalleries_MediaGalleryTitle_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set($title = false) #set($seoTitle = false) #set($page = $core_v2_mediaUrls.Current) #if ($page == 'Tags' || $page == 'GroupAggregateTags') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('TagBrowser_Title')) #elseif ($page == 'Slideshow') #set($title = "$core_v2_gallery.Current.Name $core_v2_language.GetResource('Slideshow')") #elseif ($page == 'Media') #set($media = $core_v2_media.Current) #set($title = $media.Title) #set($seoTitle = $media.MetaTitle) #elseif ($page == 'DownloadMedia') #set($title = "$core_v2_media.Current.Title $core_v2_language.GetResource('MediaGalleries_Disclaimer_Title')") #elseif ($page == 'DeleteMedia') #set($title = "$core_v2_language.GetResource('Delete') $core_v2_media.Current.Title") #elseif ($page == 'AddMedia') #set($title = $core_v2_language.GetResource('MediaGalleries_UploadFile')) #elseif($page == 'EditMedia') #set($title = $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('MediaGalleries_AddComment_EditFormatString'), $core_v2_media.Current.Title)) #end #if ($page == 'Gallery') $core_v2_page.SetTitle('', true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_gallery.Current.Name

#end #elseif ($title) #if (!$seoTitle || $seoTitle == '') #set($seoTitle = $title) #end $core_v2_page.SetTitle($seoTitle, true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$title

#end #else $core_v2_page.SetTitle($core_v2_language.GetResource('files'), true, true) #if ($core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('visible', false))

$core_v2_language.GetResource('files')

#end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="CF_Title" defaultValue="${resource:MediaGalleries_MediaGalleryTitle_Name}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="visible" labelResourceName="Title_Visible" defaultValue="False" dataType="Bool" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CF_Title">Widget Title</resource> <resource name="Delete">Delete</resource> <resource name="files">Files</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_AddComment_EditFormatString">Edit {0}</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_Disclaimer_Title">Download Agreement</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_MediaGalleryTitle_Description">Displays the title for media gallery pages.</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_MediaGalleryTitle_Name">Media Gallery - Title</resource> <resource name="MediaGalleries_UploadFile">Upload File</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="Slideshow">Slideshow</resource> <resource name="TagBrowser_Title">Browse by Tags</resource> <resource name="Title_Visible">Show the title in the page</resource> </language>
